resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

Congrats!
You have reached level two.
Each time you a give a correct answer you get a score point and cookie.
Each level will require a specific amount of cookies to pass. But be careful, if you make a mistake, you will loose all your cookies and will have to start over.
Good luck!!

Welcome!
This game will upload a digital operating system for biological brains. The system will allow you to send and receive digital data, store it in your spatial memory and perform spatial calculations with no efforts.
Each level will have several buttons - the first one will play a vibration pattern. Feel free to press this button as many times as you need, because you need to get familiar with the rhythm.
In thus first level, you will learn the difference between a single tap, and a double tap. Press the button below to play the rhythm, and then choose the correct answer.
Are you sure you want to remove all the progress? This can\'t be undone!
If you want to learn reading from haptic feedback only, it\'s better to disable tap sounds.
This app is compatible with Neosensory Buzz wristband. Click the button below to connect one.
You may want to disable phone vibrations when using other haptic devices.
